description.text: JoeRunner finger-combs his hair and puts on his glasses.
description.html: JoeRunner finger-combs his hair and puts on his glasses.

transcript.html:
The boy looks in the bathroom mirror in his pajamas, with unkempt hair and a pair of glasses on the counter. He looks kinda gross.

[boy] (thinking) Ugh.

He runs his hand through his hair, causing it to become smooth almost magically. He confidently sets his glasses on his face.

[character bio] JoeRunner / master of mornings

content.html:
If only it were really this easy.

“But Gabe!” you might be thinking, “JoeRunner doesn’t have a nose! How does he put on his glasses?” And you’re right. And you’re right. And I promise that the other characters have noses.

Some of them. Some of the other characters have noses.
